languages.text: "Неплохо, подловил{mf||а}! Не хочешь мне заодно с вербовкой подсобить, раз у тебя язык так хорошо подвешен? Потом вместе посмеемся!"

traits.locale_text: "Неплохо, подловил{mf|к|а}! Не хочешь мне заодно с вербовкой подсобить, раз у тебя язык так хорошо подвешен? Потом вместе посмеемся!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Nice one, you got me! Maybe you can help me with recruitment since you've got such a way with words? We'll laugh about it together later!"

languages.text: “干得漂亮，你真的骗到我了！既然你口才这么好，说不定你可以替我招募战士？之后咱们两个可以一起哈哈大笑！”
languages.original_text: "Nice one, you got me! Maybe you can help me with recruitment since you've got such a way with words? We'll laugh about it together later!"

traits.locale_text: “干得漂亮，你真的骗到我了！既然你口才这么好，说不定你可以替我招募战士？之后咱们两个可以一起哈哈大笑！”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「これはやられた！そこまで言葉巧みなら、新兵を探す手伝いをしてくれませんか？なかなか楽しいと思いますよ！」
languages.original_text: "Nice one, you got me! Maybe you can help me with recruitment since you've got such a way with words? We'll laugh about it together later!"

traits.locale_text: 「これはやられた！そこまで言葉巧みなら、新兵を探す手伝いをしてくれませんか？なかなか楽しいと思いますよ！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¡Muy buena, me la he tragado! A lo mejor puede ayudarme a reclutar, ya que se le dan tan bien las palabras. ¡Luego nos reiremos de esto todos juntos!».
languages.original_text: "Nice one, you got me! Maybe you can help me with recruitment since you've got such a way with words? We'll laugh about it together later!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Muy buena, me la he tragado! A lo mejor puede ayudarme a reclutar, ya que se le dan tan bien las palabras. ¡Luego nos reiremos de esto todos juntos!».

languages.text: « Ha ha, vous m'avez eu ! Puisque vous semblez avoir un don avec les mots, vous pourriez peut-être m'aider à recruter ? Je suis sûr qu'on en rira plus tard ! »
languages.original_text: "Nice one, you got me! Maybe you can help me with recruitment since you've got such a way with words? We'll laugh about it together later!"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ha, vous m'avez eu ! Puisque vous semblez avoir un don avec les mots, vous pourriez peut-être m'aider à recruter ? Je suis sûr qu'on en rira plus tard ! »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Der war gut, Ihr habt mich erwischt! Wollt Ihr mich nicht bei der Rekrutierung unterstützen, so gut, wie Ihr mit Worten umgehen könnt? Später lachen wir dann gemeinsam darüber!"
languages.original_text: "Nice one, you got me! Maybe you can help me with recruitment since you've got such a way with words? We'll laugh about it together later!"

traits.locale_text: "Der war gut, Ihr habt mich erwischt! Wollt Ihr mich nicht bei der Rekrutierung unterstützen, so gut, wie Ihr mit Worten umgehen könnt? Später lachen wir dann gemeinsam darüber!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ulan, iyi zokaladın beni! Madem sözcüklerle aran bu kadar iyi, bana yeni birilerini bulmam konusunda yardım etsene. Sonrasında beraber güleriz!"
languages.original_text: "Nice one, you got me! Maybe you can help me with recruitment since you've got such a way with words? We'll laugh about it together later!"

traits.locale_text: "İyiymiş, iyi kandırdın! Madem sözcüklerle aran bu kadar iyi, bana yeni birilerini bulmam konusunda yardım edebilirsin? Sonrasında beraber güleriz!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
